  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_454</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_454</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Ilusiones ópticas</string>
            <string language="en">Optical illusions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Optische Illusionen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Illusions optiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Illusions óticos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Illusioni ottiche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οπτικές παραισθήσεις</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones algunos ejemplos de ilusiones ópticas a partir de secciones de cubos. También se muestran algunas ilusiones ópticas clásicas de objetos imposibles.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to show some examples of optical illusions constructed with sections of cubes. The unit also shows some classic optical illusions of impossible objects.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">objeto imposible</string>
            <string language="en">impossible object</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">ilusión óptica</string>
            <string language="en">optical illusion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">sección</string>
            <string language="en">section</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">cubo</string>
            <string language="en">cube</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit, welche 
Gebrauchsimulationen, einige Beispiele der optischen Illusionen zu 
zeigen mit Kapiteln der Würfel konstruierte. Die Maßeinheit 
zeigt auch einige klassische optische Illusionen der unmöglichen 
Nachrichten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles simulations 
d'utilisations montrer quelques exemples des illusions optiques a 
construites avec des sections des cubes. L'unité montre 
également quelques illusions optiques classiques des objets 
impossibles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que simulações dos usos 
mostrar alguns exemplos de illusions óticos construiu com seções 
dos cubos. A unidade mostra também alguns illusions óticos 
clássicos de objetos impossíveis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali simulazioni di usi 
mostrare alcuni esempi delle illusioni ottiche ha costruito con le 
sezioni dei cubi. L'unità egualmente mostra alcune illusioni 
ottiche classiche degli oggetti impossibili.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις 
προσομοιώσεις για να εμφανίσει μερικά παραδείγματα των οπτικών 
παραισθήσεων κατασκεύασε με τα τμήματα των κύβων. Η μονάδα 
εμφανίζει επίσης μερικές κλασικές οπτικές παραισθήσεις των 
αδύνατων αντικειμένων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unmögliche Nachricht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">optische Illusion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kapitel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geometrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Würfel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">objet impossible</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">illusion optique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">section</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la géométrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cube</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">illusion ótico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
